## Remarks This method Looks up a localized string similar to "'{0}' is an invalid user defined type, reason: {1}.", and fills it in order with the corresponding `udtType` and `resourceReason` values.
> [!IMPORTANT] > This function is exposed for backward compatibility and should be used with the default value for the `resourceReason` parameter.
